description.zh-cn: 中国作物栽培学与耕作学家、农业教育家，曾任沈阳农业大学校长、教授、博士生导师，以及中国农学会理事。
description.en: A Chinese expert in crop cultivation and tillage, and an agricultural educator. He served as president, professor, and doctoral supervisor at Shenyang Agricultural University, and was a council member of the Chinese Association of Agricultural Science Societies.

description.zh-cn: 顾慰连之父。
description.en: Father of Gu Weilian.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的一所高等农业院校。
description.en: An institution of higher agricultural education located in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, China.

en: Chinese Association of Agricultural Science Societies

description.zh-cn: 由中国农业科学技术工作者组成的全国性、学术性、非营利性的社会组织。
description.en: A national, academic, non-profit social organization composed of Chinese agricultural science and technology workers.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 沈阳农业大学的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of Shenyang Agricultural University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院设立的领导全国学位工作的机构。
description.en: An organization established by the State Council of the People's Republic of China to lead the work on academic degrees nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 顾慰连是顾毓琇的儿子。
description.en: Gu Weilian is the son of Gu Yuxiu.

description.zh-cn: 顾慰连是江苏无锡人。
description.en: Gu Weilian was a native of Wuxi, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 曾任沈阳农业大学校长。
description.en: Served as the President of Shenyang Agricultural University.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“沈阳农业大学副校长”可知，顾慰连曾任该校副校长。
description.en: According to the page category 'Vice Presidents of Shenyang Agricultural University', Gu Weilian served as the vice president of the university.

description.zh-cn: 曾任沈阳农业大学教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Served as a professor and doctoral supervisor at Shenyang Agricultural University.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农学会理事。
description.en: Served as a council member of the Chinese Association of Agricultural Science Societies.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“中国农学会副会长”可知，顾慰连曾任该会副会长。
description.en: According to the page category 'Vice Presidents of the Chinese Association of Agricultural Science Societies', Gu Weilian served as the vice president of the association.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“复旦大学校友”可知，顾慰连是复旦大学的校友。
description.en: According to the page category 'Fudan University alumni', Gu Weilian was an alumnus of Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“沈阳农学院校友”可知，顾慰连是沈阳农学院的校友。
description.en: According to the page category 'Shenyang Agricultural College alumni', Gu Weilian was an alumnus of Shenyang Agricultural College.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“中国共产党党员”可知，顾慰连是中国共产党员。
description.en: According to the page category 'Communist Party of China members', Gu Weilian was a member of the Communist Party of China.

position.zh-cn: 第二届学科评议组成员
position.en: Member of the 2nd Academic Appraisal Group

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“国务院学位委员会第二届学科评议组成员”可知，顾慰连是该评议组成员。
description.en: According to the page category 'Members of the 2nd Academic Appraisal Group of the State Council Academic Degrees Committee', Gu Weilian was a member of this appraisal group.
